    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "filter": {

                    "type": "stop",
                    "stopwords": "_english_"

                "english_keywords": {
                    "type": "keyword_marker",
                    "keywords": [
                        "example"
                    ]
                },
                "english_stemmer": {
                    "type": "stemmer",
                    "language": "english"
                },
                "english_possessive_stemmer": {
                    "type": "stemmer",
                    "language": "possessive_english"
                }

            "analyzer": {
                "rebuilt_english": {
                    "tokenizer": "standard",
                    "filter": [
